articles.author: Madeline Holcombe, Lauren Mascarenhas and Maggie Fox, CNN
articles.title: CDC announces travel restrictions for countries hit by Ebola - CNN
articles.description: Travel precautions will be imposed for individuals coming to the US from Guinea and the Democratic Republic of Congo -- two countries fighting recent outbreaks of the Ebola virus, the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention announced Friday.

articles.description: Younger adults describe flu-like symptoms after the second dose of the COVID-19 vaccine; doctors say that's a good thing.

articles.content:
How to wear masks
Masks can help protect against the spread of Covid-19, but theyre only effective if you wear them properly.
